place.name: MELINDWR
place.gazetteerText: MELIN-DWR., a township in Llanbadarn-fawr parish, Cardigan; on the river Rheidol, near Aberystwith. Acres, 6,677. Real property, £2,799; of which £.1.029 are in mines. Polp. in 1851,1,151; in 1861,1,311. Houses, 234. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
